name: Treasure of AgonDray Grey Box Test
name_original: Treasure of AgonDray Grey Box Test
description:
**This game is in development and this is only a grey box test. 

Title: Treasure of AgonDray

Platform: PC/Web

Genre: RPG

Rating: E for Everyone

Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You have awoken to find yourself in a dungeon cell at the bottom of AgonDray castle. You are not sure how you ended up here but it stories say that AgonDray holds a forbidden treasure that is guarded by a fire-breathing beast. Lucky for you, the guard has forgotten to lock your cell and you are now journey bound to make your way through the castle dungeon in search of the forbidden treasure.

Instructions: WASD to move around, shift to sprint, and space bar to jump. 

Game Design Team: Bridget Kurr – Game Designer
